column4: Ebɛnadze na hom kɔr sar no do kɔhwɛe? Ndzɛmbir a mframa rihim no a?"

column2: "Na ebɛnadze na hom puei kɔhwɛe? Nyimpa a ofura serekye tam a? Hwɛ
column3: hɔn a wofura serekye tam wɔ ahemfo fie."

column2: "Na ebɛnadze koraa na hom kɔree kɔhwɛe? Ana dɛ hom bohu nkɔnhyɛnyi a? Nyew
column3: mese hom dɛ nyia ɔkyɛn nkɔnhyɛnyi mpo a."

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: hɔn a mbaa awo hɔn nyina mu biara mmpuei a ɔyɛ kɛse kyɛn John Onumanyi no; naaso nyia ɔyɛ aketseaba wɔ sor ahenman mu no yɛ kɛse kyɛn no."

column2: "Na ofitsi dɛ John Onumanyi no bae dze bodu ndɛ sor ahenman no gye enyiber
column3: na hɔn a hɔn enyi aber no fa no enyiɔdzen do."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo nyina nye mbra no hyɛɛ nkɔm bɛpeem John do ."
